last_episode_to_air.name: Mystery of the Teleporting Shipwreck
last_episode_to_air.overview: When a credible witness claims to have discovered the wreckage of a long-lost ship, experts launch an investigation to positively identify the missing vessel and uncover how it could be more than 10 miles from where it reportedly sank.

name: Curse of the Bermuda Triangle
overview: A team of savvy boat captains and experienced divers seeks to unravel some of the biggest secrets surrounding the Bermuda Triangle.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Throughout ‘Curse of the Bermuda Triangle,’ the team investigates a variety of mysteries and attempts to determine whether these stories of strange mishaps are purely coincidence, or if there’s an explanation – scientific or supernatural – hidden beneath the surface. Bermuda Triangle is home to some of the most fascinating unsolved mysteries on Earth. This remote territory in the Atlantic Ocean has been the subject of notoriety and legend as countless ships, planes and human lives have been lost in its waters.

episodes.name: Vanishing of Flight 19
episodes.overview: Five US Navy planes vanish without a trace in the Bermuda Triangle, fueling speculation that this strange stretch of water is cursed. Using the latest science & tech, a team of experts investigate why the planes disappeared and where they are today.

episodes.name: Aliens in the Triangle
episodes.overview: New evidence could finally explain a mysterious UFO encounter in the Bermuda Triangle, and using cutting-edge tech and the latest underwater discoveries, a team of experts investigate if aliens have visited this strange stretch of water.

episodes.name: US Navy vs. the Triangle
episodes.overview: Brand-new discoveries might finally explain the truth behind one of the Bermuda Triangle's most infamous disappearances, when 306 US Navy crewmen vanished in the Triangle without a trace.

episodes.name: Unexplained Encounters
episodes.overview: Brand-new discoveries may finally explain the truth behind one of the Bermuda Triangle’s most infamous disappearances.

episodes.name: Witchcraft in the Devils Triangle
episodes.overview: A new lead may finally solve the mystery of the Witchcraft, a yacht that disappeared in the Bermuda Triangle in 1967; a cutting-edge expedition leads experts to a surprising discovery on the ocean floor.

episodes.name: Ghost Ship Terror
episodes.overview: Sightings of ghost ships are frequent in the Bermuda Triangle, and using cutting-edge underwater technology and witness testimony, a team of experts turns up new evidence to explain why sailors and crewmen vanish from their boats without a trace.

episodes.name: Monster in the Abyss
episodes.overview: A team of experts is hot on the trail of the legendary sea monster reported to live in the underwater caves of the Bermuda Triangle, and using cutting-edge tech and witness testimony, they dive into these chambers to hunt for the deadly beast.

episodes.name: Mystery of the Teleporting Shipwreck
episodes.overview: When a credible witness claims to have discovered the wreckage of a long-lost ship, experts launch an investigation to positively identify the missing vessel and uncover how it could be more than 10 miles from where it reportedly sank.

Bermuda Triangle is home to some of the most fascinating unsolved mysteries on Earth. This remote territory in the Atlantic Ocean has been the subject of notoriety and legend as countless ships, planes and human lives have been lost in its waters.
